## Goal

1. Load and normalize data
2. Differential analysis

## Install Packages

Install necessary packages from bioconductor repository. Run this code only once to install packages.

```{r eval=FALSE}
source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
biocLite("oligo")
```

Load packages.

```{r}
library(oligo)
```
